scripts.desktop:dev: concurrently "cd core && go run ." "cd desktop && npm run dev"
scripts.desktop:build: npm run desktop:build-backend && cd desktop && npm run build
scripts.desktop:dist: npm run desktop:build-backend && cd desktop && npm run dist
scripts.desktop:dist:win: npm run desktop:build-backend && cd desktop && npm run dist:win
scripts.desktop:dist:mac: npm run desktop:build-backend && cd desktop && npm run dist:mac
scripts.desktop:dist:linux: npm run desktop:build-backend && cd desktop && npm run dist:linux
